column2: this sandwich is pretty freaking awesome. The chicken is always fresh and soft
column3: and the crushed chips and nut seed crumble offer just the right crunch. It's become my go-to order here
column4: so much so that I don't feel a need to try anything else on their menu. I've tried the chips
column5: fresh fruit (which they switch up seasonally)
column6: and beet salad as sides so far. I'd recommend them all
column7: though the chips have a certain bitterness I don't always care for.
